summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hinds Street from 19th Avenue South to the alley east of 19th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99187 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
